summary.span: Animates the value of a property along a set of .

span.span: Animates the value of a property along a set of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关键帧动画的目标值由定义其属性，其中包含一套对象。A key frame animation's target values are defined by its property, which contains a collection of objects. 每个定义与其自己目标动画段和。Each defines a segment of the animation with its own target and . 动画运行时，它从进展一个键值为在指定下一步键次。When the animation runs, it progresses from one key value to the next at the specified key times. 有三种类型的类，一个用于每个受支持的内插方法： ， ，和。There are three types of classes, one for each supported interpolation method: , , and . 与不同、可有多个两个目标值。Unlike a , a can have more than two of target values. 你还可以控制个人的内插方法段。You can also control the interpolation method of individual segments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A不接受文本为子级，因此此方法将引发`InvalididOperationException`除非派生的类已重写允许添加文本的行为。A does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise an `InvalididOperationException` unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一个组合链中此值将为快照值 （如果有的话） 或基属性值; 否则此值将为返回链中的上一个动画的值不 。If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an that is not . `defaultDestinationValue`是基本值，如果动画在动画的属性上的第一个组合层，则; 否则值为前一的组合图层的属性的动画的输出值。The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.

span.span: if the animation accumulates its values when its property causes it to repeat its simple duration; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`true`，该动画的输出时，值仅累计该动画的属性使其重复播放其简单持续时间。When this property is set to `true`, the animation's output values only accumulate when the animation's property causes it to repeat its simple duration. 它不会不会累计其值，因为其父重复重新启动时，或因为其时钟已重新启动从调用。It does not accumulate its values when it restarts because its parent repeated or because its clock was restarted from a call.
